item.description:
Hi all,

This is an FYI event.

Saturday, the Boston Asian American Film Festival is working with Women,
Action & the Media Boston (WAM!Boston) to co-present No Look Pass--it's a documentary about about a Harvard University Asian American who strives to play professional basketball while coming out as a lesbian to her traditional family (yes, she did play during the same time Jeremy Lin was there, and has some equally athletic skills). presents a unique lineup of films made by and about women from up-and-coming filmmakers, many from the Boston area.

The WAM!Boston Film Festival will be held Saturday at the Brattle Theatre
in Cambridge starting at 1:00 pm and No Look Pass will begin at 9:30 pm.
Tickets can be purchased at
http://brattlefilm.org/2012/03/24/wam-film-festival/ or at the door, while
tickets last.

BAAFF is a production of AARW and funding is provided in part by Tufts
Medical Center and Mass Cultural Council.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: No Look Pass - documentary film screening
